DOC.brief_summary: This trial provide additional important information impact treatment man ED vardenafil partnership . This study run 50 study center Europe South Africa evaluate use vardenafil adult men erectile dysfunction ( often call impotence ) , female partner 's sexual quality life . Many men experience occasional erectile problem live . However , become continued problem , affect man female partner . The cause erectile dysfunction vary may due physiological emotional reason . This study design 1 ) study effectiveness safety vardenafil , 2 ) show whether treat man erectile dysfunction vardenafil improve female partner sexual quality life . The second part ( week 12 ) study ( Educational program ) subgroup subjects/couples , approximately 50 % randomized subject , receive educational program concern ED DVD .
DOC.brief_title: Levitra ( Vardenafil , BAY38-9456 ) Partner Satisfaction Study II
DOC.criteria: Males 18 64 year Males ED six month , accord NIH Consensus Statement ( inability attain and/or maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) Stable heterosexual relationship 6 month The subject must make least four attempt sexual intercourse Documented , date , write Informed Consent Inclusion Criteria Partner Females 18 year , old Stable , heterosexual relationship 6 month male ED subject Documented , date , write Informed Consent Motivated support treatment male partner 's ED Absence significant sexual dysfunction assess total score FSFI16 > 23.55 Any unstable medical condition substance abuse disorder , opinion Investigator , likely affect patient 's ability complete study preclude patient 's participation study Subjects take nitrate nitric oxide donor Subjects take follow inhibitor cytochrome P 450 CYP 3A4 : potent HIV protease inhibitor ( ritonavir , indinavir ) , antimycotic agent traconazole ketoconazole ( topical form allow ) erythromycin Known hypersensitivity vardenafil Presence significant penile anatomical abnormality ( e.g . penile fibrosis Peyronie 's disease ) History retinitis pigmentosa Unstable angina pectoris Severe chronic acute liver disease Premature ejaculator ( define IELT < 2 minute ) Subjects take alpha blocker Lost vision one eye NAION Exclusion Criteria Partner Presence sexual dysfunction assess FSFI16 < 23.55 Any unstable medical condition substance abuse disorder , opinion Investigator , likely affect partner 's ability complete study preclude partner 's participation study
